desc.p: Fields RISK.CODE to form a related multi value set. Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 4 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the LIMIT.REFERENCE file.
Fields RISK.CODE to form a related multi value set.
A maximum of 19 characters may be entered.
Fields COLLAT.CODE to form a related multi value set.
A maximum of 19 characters may be entered.
Fields COLLAT.CODE to form a related multi value set. Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 4 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the LIMIT.COLLAT file.
A maximum of 10 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the CUSTOMER file.
